escape-string-regexp

Escape RegExp special characters

Install

sh $ npm install --save escape-string-regexp

Usage

```js var escapeStringRegexp = require(‘escape-string-regexp’);

var escapedString = escapeStringRegexp(‘how much $ for a unicorn?’); //=> how much $ for a unicorn\?

new RegExp(escapedString); ```
